item.title: David add a quote by Dean Martin
item.description: "I feel sorry for people who don't drink. When they wake up in the morning, that's as good as they're going to feel all day." -- Dean Martin

item.title: David add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: David add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: David add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: David add a quote by May Sarton
item.description: "We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be." -- May Sarton

item.title: David add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: David add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: David add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: David add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: David add a quote by Jon Stewart
item.description: "If America leads a blessed life, then why did God put all of our oil under people who hate us?" -- Jon Stewart

item.title: David add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: David add a quote by Sharon Stone
item.description: "Women can fake an orgasm, but men can fake an entire relationship." -- Sharon Stone

item.title: David add a quote by Thomas Szasz
item.description: "Two wrongs don't make a right, but they make a good excuse." -- Thomas Szasz

item.title: David add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: David add a quote by Anthony G. Oettinger
item.description: "Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana." -- Anthony G. Oettinger

item.title: David add a quote by mark twain
item.description: "But who prays for Satan? Who, in eighteen centuries, has had the common humanity to pray for the one sinner that needed it most?" -- mark twain

item.title: David add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I think God, in creating man, somewhat overestimated his ability." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: David add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I refuse to answer that question on the grounds that I don't know the answer" -- Douglas Adams

item.title: David add a quote by Robin Williams
item.description: "See, the problem is that God gives men a brain and a penis, and only enough blood to run one at a time." -- Robin Williams

item.title: David add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "Right now I’m having amnesia and déjà vu at the same time. I think I’ve forgotten this before." -- Steven Wright

item.title: David add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "The reason I talk to myself is because I’m the only one whose answers I accept." -- George Carlin

item.title: David add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "If you were me, then I'd be you, and if I were you, then I'd hide somewhere far away." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: David add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "TV and the Internet are good because they keep stupid people from spending too much time out in public." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: David add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "The best teacher is experience and not through someone's distorted point of view" -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: David add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "I realized these were all the snapshots which our children would look at someday with wonder, thinking their parents had lived smooth, well-ordered lives and got up in the morning to walk proudly on the sidewalks of life, never dreaming the raggedy madness and riot of our actual lives, our actual night, the hell of it, the senseless emptiness." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: David add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "But, outside of being a sweet little girl, she was awfully dumb and capable of doing horrible things." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: David add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "A pain stabbed my heart, as it did every time I saw a girl I loved who was going the opposite direction in this too-big world." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: David add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not." -- Andre Gide

item.title: David add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "I'm the one that's got to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life the way I want to." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: David add a quote by Tom Clancy
item.description: "The difference between fiction and reality? Fiction has to make sense." -- Tom Clancy
